content:
Hulu has an impressive collection of documentaries, including several critically acclaimed series and films. Here are some popular and highly recommended documentaries on Hulu:

**Documentary Series:**

* **Free Solo** (2018): A thrilling documentary series that follows Alex Honnold's attempt to climb El Capitan in Yosemite National Park without any ropes.
* **Fyre Fraud** (2019): A documentary series that explores the failed Fyre Festival, a luxury music festival that turned out to be a massive scam.
* **The Case Against Adnan Syed** (2019): A follow-up to the popular "Serial" podcast, this docu-series re-examines the case of Adnan Syed, who was convicted of murdering his ex-girlfriend Hae Min Lee.
* **The Act of Killing** (2012): A surreal and thought-provoking series that explores the 1965 Indonesian massacre through the perspectives of the perpetrators.
* **McMillion$** (2020): A documentary series that delves into the McDonald's Monopoly game scam of the 1990s and 2000s.

**Documentary Films:**

* **Minding the Gap** (2018): A coming-of-age documentary that explores the lives of three young skateboarders from Illinois, delving into themes of identity, family, and trauma.
* **The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley** (2019): A documentary film about the rise and fall of Theranos, a biotech company that claimed to have revolutionized blood testing.
* **The September Issue** (2009): A behind-the-scenes look at the creation of the September issue of Vogue magazine, featuring Anna Wintour and her team.
* **The Imposter** (2012): A true-crime documentary that tells the story of a young Frenchman who impersonated a missing Texas boy.
* **The Queen of Versailles** (2012): A documentary film that follows the lives of Jackie and David Siegel, a wealthy couple who attempt to build the largest house in America.

**Other notable documentaries on Hulu:**

* **The Beatles: Eight Days a Week** (2016)
* **The Newspaperman: The Life and Times of Ben Bradlee** (2017)
* **The Family I Had** (2019)
* **Tiny Shoulders: Rethinking Barbie** (2018)
* **The Gospel According to André** (2017)

Hulu regularly updates its documentary collection, so you'll find new and exciting titles added regularly.

Keep in mind that Hulu's documentary selection might vary depending on your location, so you might not have access to all of these titles. However, they have a vast library of documentaries to choose from, so you're sure to find something that interests you!
